channel.title: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?
channel.description:
I haven't made that yet but hope to... the question i ask myself is "am i being patient enough?" so... Just curious, how long had you been uploading tracks before you got to at least 100 followers on soundcloud? I know this question only pertains to some people but i think it can profit all.
Thanks for any replies.

item.title: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?
item.dc:creator: Shadewater
item.description:
Wow, than you so much! That means so much to me

Read full topic

item.source: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?

item.title: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?
item.dc:creator: Morgen
item.description:
I‚Äôve been using Auxy for about one and a half years and I‚Äôm at 64 (and grateful for thatüòä) For most of that time @crystldawnmusic was the only one liking or commenting anything (so grateful for the supportüòä). I say that for those who haven‚Äôt been as successful at getting followers so quickly. For me I think there are three main reasons (in levels of importance as far as I can tell):

(1) I wasn‚Äôt that involved with the community,
(2) looking back some of it just wasn‚Äôt that good.
(3) I write in less popular genres in the Auxy community (house, synth-indie stuff),

But it‚Äôs crucial to continue writing music through the ‚Äònot that good‚Äô phase cuz that‚Äôs the only way to get better. I am more and more pleased with the music I am able to make, and wished I could have had a faster learning curve, but can see I‚Äôve had to learn every principle piece by piece, and there is no shortcutüòä.

Hang in there if you struggle to get followers. There‚Äôs a lot of good advice on this thread, and never forget, the most important thing is to have fun, and to enjoy what you‚Äôre doing. And often, that will lead you to the followers and fan base you are looking for.

(Adding afterwards) I think being involved outside of Auxy is a huge and important factor.

Read full topic
item.source: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?

Wow. Getting to 100 in two months is amazing, you‚Äôre super talented bro tho so what should we expect‚Ä¶ maybe we can all help each other to reach our goals! My goal for this month is 20‚Ä¶ I need 6 or 7 more

item.title: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?
item.dc:creator: moemx
item.description:
first 100 took 2 months, second hundred about 4-5 I think 150 is like the ‚Äúmagic‚Äù auxy number, that we can reach by supporting each other - way more doesn‚Äôt go within just here I believe. but as so many have said already: spreading the word and widening your fanbase (other forums, communities etc) is crucial

also I don‚Äôt know about you guys and gals, but once in a while you lose like 30 followers in one night, probably all those spam account being taken down. still: fck.

Read full topic
item.source: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?

item.source: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?

item.title: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?
item.dc:creator: BALLISTIK
item.description:
Agreed. I had like 5 followers when I uploaded Snowscapes, and it got me like 5 followers. Then I uploaded Miami Tides, got reposted, and gained like another 7 or so followers. Like 9 days later I uploaded Adrenaline and it got me like 10 more followers. A couple days ago I uploaded a little one minute Auxy 5 demo thing, and gained the same number of followers as after uploading Snowscapes!

Read full topic
item.source: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?

item.title: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?
item.dc:creator: TXA
item.description:
Well you see, you probably used a linear method. Your estimate is most likely completely incorrect. Rising up in the music field is an exponential scale. So you‚Äôll be there sooner than expected. Give it a few months, maybe 3 or 4

As long as you keep pumpin out great stuff

Read full topic

item.title: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?
item.dc:creator: Cheddr
item.description:
I was stuck around 47 until I started reaching outside this community as other people have described. @MR_ANDERSON is right through. the difference between 20 and 100 followers is NOT like the difference between me and Marshmello.

I have enjoyed learning some things about marketing myself. And I like the encouragment I get from it. But I wouldn‚Äôt recommend worrying about any of this if it stresses you out. Find something else about it to enjoy.

Read full topic
item.source: How long did it take you to get to 100+ followers?
